Know Your Quantum Risk
Before It's Too Late

Scan, score, and remediate quantum-vulnerable cryptography across your entire infrastructure. ML-powered risk assessment with NIST FIPS 203/204 migration planning.

Everything You Need to Go Quantum-Safe

From discovery to remediation â€” QRAP covers the entire post-quantum migration lifecycle

ğŸ”

Cryptographic Discovery

Scan your infrastructure to discover every cryptographic asset. Identify quantum-vulnerable algorithms â€” RSA, ECDSA, DH, DSA â€” across six risk categories with precise version and key-length detection.

ğŸ§ 

ML-Powered Risk Scoring

Composite 0â€“100 risk scores powered by machine learning. Severity-weighted scoring with category-specific multipliers â€” HNDL findings weighted 1.5x for maximum accuracy.

â°

HNDL Exposure Calculator

Calculate precise Harvest Now, Decrypt Later risk windows using the Mosca inequality. Understand exactly when your encrypted data becomes vulnerable to quantum decryption.

ğŸ—ºï¸

PQC Migration Planning

Automated migration roadmaps from classical to post-quantum algorithms. RSA â†’ ML-KEM (FIPS 203), ECDSA â†’ ML-DSA (FIPS 204) with phased rollout schedules and effort estimates.

ğŸ“Š

Interactive Dashboard

React-powered dashboard for real-time risk visualization. Drill down from organization-level scores to individual findings. Track risk trends across assessment cycles.

ğŸ”

Enterprise Security

JWT + API key authentication with constant-time comparison. Per-IP rate limiting, HSTS, CSP, parameterized SQL queries â€” defense in depth for production deployments.

Built for Scale

A polyglot architecture combining Go performance, Python ML, and React interactivity

âš¡

Go API Server

Chi v5 router with middleware pipeline â€” auth, rate limiting, CORS, and security headers

ğŸ§ 

Python ML Engine

FastAPI with scikit-learn for risk scoring, HNDL calculations, and migration planning

ğŸ“Š

React Dashboard

React 19 + TypeScript SPA for real-time risk visualization and assessment management

Up and Running in 60 Seconds

One command to deploy the full stack â€” API, ML engine, dashboard, and database

Docker Quick Start
# Clone and start the full stack
$ git clone https://github.com/yazhsab/qbitel-qrap.git && cd qbitel-qrap
$ docker compose -f infra/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
$ make migrate
# Verify
$ curl http://localhost:8083/health
{"status":"ok","service":"qrap-api"}
:8083
REST API
Go + Chi v5
:8084
ML Engine
Python + FastAPI
:3002
Dashboard
React 19

Try the API

Create an assessment & calculate HNDL risk
# Create an organization
$ curl -X POST localhost:8083/api/v1/organizations \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"name": "Acme Corp"}'
# Calculate HNDL risk for RSA-2048
$ curl -X POST localhost:8083/api/v1/hndl \
-d '{"algorithm": "RSA-2048", "data_shelf_life_years": 15}'
{"risk_level": "CRITICAL", "years_until_vulnerable": 4}

QRAP is open source under Apache 2.0. Whether you're a cryptographer, Go/Python developer, or security professional â€” there's a place for you here.
